result.title: Invitation for "IEMCO" IEM Coding Olympiad April Challenge.
result.content:
Hello Codeforces Community!! On behalf of the Institute of Engineering and Management, Kolkata.

I (harshit19) would like to Invite you, to take part in the upcoming IEMCO (April Challenge).

The contest will start on 21st April 2018, 20:00 hrs.It is a 3 Hours Contest. With Prizes worth ₹ 50,000.

This is a team contest, so a separate registration is needed for the team to participate. Go through the following steps to register your team:

  1. Login with your normal CodeChef user ID (If you do not have one Click here).
  2. Click on the Team Registration Link and register your team for the contest.
  3. Click logout in the top right corner and login using the Team Name and password you registered with.
  4. You can get more information about team contests Here..

Good Luck and all the very best.
